name: Jackson’s Tortilla Soup
instructions: Add tortilla strips; cook until browned and crisp, stirring occasionally.
Add onion, celery, jalapeno and garlic to pan.
Cut the chicken into bite sized pieces.
Grill the breast in separate pan until done.
Add tomato paste and tomatoes to onion.
Bring to a simmer, add broth corn cumin, cilantro, seasonings and breast pieces.
Serve top with tortilla strips and cheese.
